simd_packed_half8 Type Aliassimd_packed_half8typealias simd_packed_half8 = SIMD8<Float16>DiscussionA vector of eight 16-bit floating-point numbers with relaxed alignment.

# simd_packed_half8 | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ simd ](/documentation/simd)

-  simd_packed_half8 

Type Alias# simd_packed_half8



```
typealias simd_packed_half8 = SIMD8<Float16>
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/simd/simd_packed_half8#discussion)

A vector of eight 16-bit floating-point numbers with relaxed alignment.

This type is not available in Metal. The alignment of this type is only that of the underlying scalar element type, so you can use it to load or store from an array of that type.
